mapper.select: SELECT id, schoolname, email, password, classname, teachername FROM teachers ORDER BY id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO teachers (schoolname, email, password, classname, teachername) VALUES (#{schoolname}, #{email}, #{password}, #{classname}, #{teachername})
mapper.update: UPDATE teachers SET schoolname = #{schoolname}, email = #{email}, password = #{password}, classname = #{classname}, teachername = #{teachername} WHERE id = #{id}
